insert into ttmt_movie (douban_id, `name`, `alias`, cover_url, douban_score, douban_vote, mins, release_date, `year`, created_time, updated_time, storyline, tags) values (#{doubanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doubanScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{doubanVote,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storyline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ttmt_movie set douban_id = #{doubanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `alias` = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, douban_score = #{doubanScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, douban_vote = #{doubanVote,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mins = #{mins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, release_date = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `year` = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, storyline = #{storyline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
